settings.hero_heading: Commercial Wool Solutions for Sustainable Growth

settings.image-with-content_heading: Wool.Life – Natural Solutions for Commercial Needs
settings.image-with-content_text: Wool.Life provides a variety of commercial solutions designed to support sustainability across different industries. Our products, made from 100% New Zealand wool, are eco-friendly alternatives that cater to the needs of sectors such as landscaping, agriculture, packaging, and insulation. We help businesses reduce their environmental impact while offering effective, natural solutions that promote long-term sustainability and growth. Contact us

custom_css: .wl_image-with-content_content a {background: #154734; padding: 20px 48px; color: #e9ddc6; text-align: center; font-family: Sora; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 700; line-height: 100%; letter-spacing: 0.32px; text-transform: uppercase; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 48px; transition: background 0.3s ease; width: fit-content;}

settings.image-with-content_text: Wool.Life’s wool-based packaging solutions offer a sustainable alternative to traditional materials like plastic and foam. Our wool packaging is durable, shock-absorbent, and biodegradable, making it ideal for businesses looking to minimise their environmental footprint. Wool’s natural insulation properties also provide temperature control, making it perfect for packaging sensitive products that require stable conditions during transport, such as food, wine, and pharmaceuticals. By choosing wool packaging, your business not only reduces waste but also reinforces its commitment to eco-friendly practices. Contact us

custom_css: .wl_image-with-content_content a {background: #154734; padding: 20px 48px; color: #e9ddc6; text-align: center; font-family: Sora; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 700; line-height: 100%; letter-spacing: 0.32px; text-transform: uppercase; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 48px; transition: background 0.3s ease; width: fit-content;}

settings.image-with-content_heading: Wool Blend Insulation for Commercial and Residential Projects
settings.image-with-content_text: Wool.Life offers wool blend insulation that combines the natural benefits of wool with other polymers, providing superior thermal and acoustic performance for both commercial and residential buildings. Our insulation is not only highly effective at regulating temperature, reducing energy costs, and improving indoor air quality, but it’s also fire-resistant and non-toxic. By choosing wool insulation, businesses can contribute to a more sustainable built environment while ensuring a healthier and more energy-efficient space. Read more

settings.image-with-content_heading: Mulch and Weed Mat Solutions for Commercial Planting
settings.image-with-content_text: We provide mulch and weed mat products for large-scale planting projects in native revegetation, riparian planting, commercial landscaping, viticulture, and horticulture. Our Wool Mulch Mats retain moisture, release essential nutrients into the soil as they biodegrade, supporting plant growth while minimising maintenance and suppress weeds. Read more
